title: Himi 178
lyrics:
6-8’s
1.
’Eiki ko e me’a lelei
Ho’o pule kiate au,
Pea ko hoku loto ni,
Ke u hoko kiate koe;
Ke kau taha hoku loto
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona.
2.
Pea u fie muimui
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona,
Pea u tuku li’aki pē
‘Eku holi fakamaama,
Mo ‘eku tokanga kovi,
Ki he me’a ‘i lalo ni.
3.
‘Oua na’a ku toe hē,
‘I he ngaahi me’a maama,
Ka te u li’aki fulipē,
He ko e me’a va’inga,
Pea u fai ho finangalo,
‘I he ‘aho kotoa pē.
4.
‘Oku ‘o’ou ‘a e mālohi,
‘O māmani kotoa pē,
Pea mo e langi foki,
‘Oku ‘i he ‘Afiona,
‘A e fonu kotoa pē,
‘I hēvani mo māmani. *
